column6: GET READY FOR JAW-DROPPING REVEALS, FLASH FLOODS AND MASKED BANDITS AS MARVEL'S ALL-NEW EPIC BASED ON DISNEY'S THRILL-PACKED ATTRACTION ROARS ONWARDS! Abigail Bullion knew there was something strange about her father's mine in Big Thunder Mountain...but she never expected this! Desperate times call for desperate alliances...and a flash flood in the desert town is as desperate as it gets! Plus: the shocking truth about the gang of bandits that will change Abby's destiny!
column8: | penciller (cover):Pasqual Ferry | writer:Dennis Hopeless | artist:Tigh Walker
